summary: Pre-publication testing completed for ImovLocal - Portal Imobiliário para Mato Grosso do Sul. All major features tested and working correctly. Backend API: 19/19 tests passed. Frontend UI: All critical flows working.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
API endpoints properly handle errors and return appropriate status codes
MongoDB ObjectId properly excluded from responses
Environment variables properly used for configuration
seed_data_creation: Created test visit scheduling entry during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested and working. Backend API fully functional. Frontend responsive on desktop and mobile. Admin panel accessible via /login page. Map functionality working with Leaflet. Visit scheduling form working correctly.

homepage.details: Loads correctly with search form, banners, property listings, and navigation

property_search.details: Filters present for finalidade, tipo, UF, cidade, bairro, faixa de preço

property_detail.details: Shows property info, photos, price, location, owner contact, visit scheduling form

ver_no_mapa_button.details: Button present and opens Leaflet map modal with property marker

visit_scheduling.details: Form submits successfully, shows success message

anunciante_profile.details: Shows profile header, bio, CRECI, properties with working filters (Todos/Venda/Aluguel)

busca_no_mapa.details: Map loads with markers, property list sidebar visible

admin_login.details: Login via /login page, redirects to /admin/master for admin users

admin_panel.details: Dashboard shows stats, quick actions, recent registrations

footer.details: Contains logo, links, contact info, disclaimer about responsibility

seo_meta_tags.details: Meta description and Open Graph tags present

mobile_responsiveness.details: Mobile menu present, pages render correctly on 390x844 viewport

api_properties.details: GET /api/properties/ returns list with owner info, filters working

api_auth.details: POST /api/auth/login returns JWT token, GET /api/auth/me returns profile
